static PyObject* py_addFogEmitter ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

adds a fog emitter to the current location

args are : density ( try between 2 and 10 ) radius ( in metres ) colour ( argb in packed 32 bit fmt )

static PyObject* py_delFogEmitter ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

deletes a fog emitter

args are : the fog emitter
